'''Featherfall Judgment''' is [[Cyno]]'s [[Passive Talent]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Endseer stance occurs every '''4s''', and each lasts for '''1.4s'''.
* If Cyno is [[stagger]]ed during the activation of his Mortuary Rite during the Endseer stance, the Judication effect will be preserved and applied to the next instance of Mortuary Rite even if cast outside of the Endseer stance.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|ascension|4|Authority Over the Nine Bows|character=Cyno|talent=Featherfall Judgment|affects Featherfall Judgment as follows: "Cyno's DMG values will be increased based on his Elemental Mastery:}}
** Pactsworn Pathclearer's Normal Attack DMG is increased by 125% of his Elemental Mastery.
** Duststalker Bolt DMG from his Passive Talent Featherfall Judgment is increased by 250% of his Elemental Mastery."

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|1|Ordinance: Unceasing Vigil}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|6|Raiment: Just Scales}}
